Do La Roche-Posay face washes include sulfates? If you want a sulfate-free face cleanser, try Toleriane Hydrating Gentle Wash or Toleriane Purifying Foaming Wash. Only a few of our face cleansers include sodium laureth sulfate (SLES), which is a gentler alternative to sodium lauryl sulfate (SLS). What is La Roche-Posay’s best face wash for sensitive skin? All of our cleansers are suitable for sensitive skin. Favorites for sensitive skin are Toleriane Hydrating Gentle Facial Cleanser and Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Wash. These sulfate-free cleansers are ideal for daily facial cleansing. What is La Roche-Posay’s best face wash for dry skin? For those with dry skin, we recommend Toleriane Hydrating Gentle Facial Cleanser. and Toleriane Dermo Milky Cleanser. These non-foaming, gentle face cleansers efficiently cleanse the skin and remove impurities

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great price and overall great product
reviews.reviewText: La Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Cleanser has quickly become my go-to solution for makeup removal and effective cleansing, and for good reason. This oil-free face wash has managed to address my pet peeve of stubborn raccoon eyes post-mascara removal, all while maintaining a perfect balance of hydration for my skin.The standout feature of this facial cleanser is its remarkable ability to effortlessly remove all traces of makeup in a single wash. Bid farewell to the frustration of raccoon eyes after washing off mascara – this cleanser tackles even the most stubborn makeup with ease. The foaming formula provides a thorough and deep clean, leaving my face feeling fresh and makeup-free in one go.The non-drying formula is a game-changer for those with oily skin. It effectively cleanses without stripping the skin of its natural moisture, ensuring that my face is clean and refreshed without feeling tight or overly dry. This is a crucial factor in maintaining a healthy skin balance, and La Roche-Posay has nailed it with this formulation.The lasting effects of reduced oiliness throughout the day add another layer of appeal to this cleanser. For someone prone to midday shine, the Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Cleanser has proven to be a reliable companion in keeping excess oil at bay without compromising on the overall health of my skin.The pump dispenser is practical and ensures a controlled amount of product with each use. The packaging is also travel-friendly, making it easy to maintain a consistent skincare routine on the go.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best facial product I have used!
reviews.reviewText: I have sensitive skin and skin that tends to be dry in the winter, oiler in the summer (so combo skin). I originally got a small tube of this at my skin doctor appointment over the summer. It lathers up so nicely, you don't need to use a lot, and it leaves your skin feeling clean, smooth, and soft. Its not drying. I purchased this one on here. Its not cheap but its worth it. Soap is bad for the skin...its drying and promotes quicker wrinkling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My favorite face wash!
reviews.reviewText: This stuff foams up really well (when emulsified in the hands) and makes my skin feel super clean without drying it out. There's no scent and a little goes a long way. The bottle lasts a long time. I highly recommend this face wash! I'm in my early 40s and it's wintertime so the air is dry and my skin usually suffers. But this facewash makes my skin feel (and look!) wonderful.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Game-Changer for My Skincare Routine
reviews.reviewText: I recently incorporated the La Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Cleanser into my skincare routine, and I am absolutely thrilled with the results. This cleanser has truly transformed my skincare experience, earning a well-deserved five-star rating for its exceptional performance, gentle formulation, and noticeable effectiveness.First and foremost, the standout feature of this cleanser is its ability to purify and cleanse my skin without causing any dryness or irritation. The gentle foaming formula effectively removes impurities, excess oil, and makeup, leaving my skin feeling refreshed, clean, and balanced. I appreciate how this cleanser does its job without stripping away the natural moisture of my skin, ensuring a comfortable and healthy complexion.As someone with sensitive skin, I am delighted to have found a cleanser that is specifically formulated for intolerant skin types. The La Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Cleanser is fragrance-free, paraben-free, and hypoallergenic, making it suitable for even the most sensitive skin. I have experienced no redness, itching, or irritation after using this cleanser, which speaks volumes about its gentle and non-irritating nature.The cleanser's texture is luxurious and lightweight, allowing it to effortlessly glide over my skin. It creates a soft, cushiony lather that feels soothing and comforting. The foaming action adds an extra touch of indulgence to my skincare routine, making it a pleasant and enjoyable experience every time.Another notable aspect of this cleanser is its effectiveness in removing makeup. Even stubborn mascara and long-lasting foundations are effortlessly dissolved, leaving no residue behind. I appreciate the convenience of having a cleanser that not only effectively cleanses my skin but also removes makeup in one step, saving time and simplifying my skincare routine.The packaging of the La Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Cleanser is practical and hygienic. The pump dispenser allows for easy and controlled dispensing, preventing waste and ensuring that the product remains fresh and uncontaminated. It is also travel-friendly, making it convenient to take along on trips or to the gym.Furthermore, the La Roche-Posay brand's commitment to dermatological research and their collaboration with dermatologists adds credibility and reassurance. The Toleriane range is known for its high-quality formulations that are backed by science, making it a trusted choice for those who prioritize skincare products that are gentle, effective, and dermatologically tested.In conclusion, the La Roche-Posay Toleriane Purifying Foaming Facial Cleanser has become a game-changer in my skincare routine. Its gentle yet effective formulation, ability to remove makeup, and its compatibility with sensitive skin make it a standout cleanser. I highly recommend this cleanser and give it a well-deserved five-star rating for its exceptional performance, gentle nature, and noticeable results.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Gentle on the skin
reviews.reviewText: This product cleanses the skin without over drying the skin and has a good lather.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good product at a great price!
reviews.reviewText: This product makes my skin feel very clean! I have normally to slightly oily skin. It does not make my skin too oily or too dry. Just very clean! This is a well- known name brand, at a great price. A little goes a very long way!I love this product just as much as some of the very pricy products that I have bought in the past. I will definitely continue to buy.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great facial cleaner.
reviews.reviewText: First of all I'm not being paid for this xD.My skincare is very plane since I prefer not using a lot of things, just washing my face, sunscreen and moisturizer.And it's funny you know when you buy things like this you expect them to be kind of small? But it has a good size and you don't need much to clean your face each time, just like one tap and that is ENOUGH.Is super soft, smells really soft and leaves your face really clean. I thought this brand would be kind of unaffortable for me when I heard of it bc it sounds kinda expensive haha, but it lasts a looooong time and it's really gentle to my pocket, 10/10.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good face wash
reviews.reviewText: It’s a pretty big bottle and great value for the price. This size is going to last me probably 8-10 months! Leaves my skin feeling clean every-time and not greasy or dry like others will.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 7, 2023

reviews.reviewText: I am very pleased with this face wash. Professional home skin care. Delivery was on time, the box was well packed without damage. I plan to buy a second bottle, the bottle is big, I really like it. Thank you.
Mi è piaciuto sopratutto perché non secca la pelle,quindi è sicuramente delicato!

This is a fabulous cleanser that doesn't strip your skin of its natural oils that are good for you. I normally use this as my second cleanse when I have makeup on. If you want to take off make up I would recommend using a cleansing balm first and then this product to get off the residue and prevent future pimples or breakouts. Its an amazing cleanser and lasts so long as you don't need that much product.

Apta para piel sensible, enfocada en piel grasa o mixta; deja la piel MUY limpia, realmente a profundidad, pero en pieles secas sí puede resecar. Ingredientes 10/10, combate acné fungico, exceso de grasa y algunos brotes por su % de niacinamida. Consistencia súper espumosa. Sinceramente excelente producto, y por la cantidad te dura bastantes meses (8-10)
